2061890.name: RPG Maker MZ - Winlu Fantasy Tileset - Exterior
2061890.description:
Immerse yourself in a medieval fantasy world with this fantasy exterior tileset from Winlu. This tileset allows you to build a variety of houses and castles with a wide range of wall textures and windows, as well as roofs to make each of your houses look unique. From a simple house to a castle or a dark tower, everything you need is included!

There are also numerous assets for flora, vegetation and landscapes. Wide meadows, forests and mountains are possible with this package. With a large selection of flowers, mushrooms and trees, you can create a lot of vegetation variation.

Countless animated sprites such as flags, torches, lamps, fireplaces, doors, gates, usable boxes, levers, switches and a water wheel are included in this package, which breathe life into your game.

Includes:

* 18 character sheets
* 9 tile sheets


* UPDATE Dec 2025:

- Added a complete new character sheet "cliff decoration" to get more variation on cliffs.
- Statues also have a additional brighter version now.
- Improved Stone wall and floor textures
- Improved chests


* UPDATE May 2025:

- Added roofs as events for a centered placement (can also combined with the tileset)
- Improved barrels
- Reworked and improved !decoration sprites
- Reworked forge
- New statues
- Reworked and improved pixelart trees
- Added trees without the shadow as extra tilesheet
- Added a new terrain A2 tilesheet with shadow overlay texture



Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
2061890.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
